channel.title: Password Help

item.title: Password Help
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

ive been trying all day to get this to work for client .

i got my idea from this server sided command :

if(cmd[0].equals("getpass")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null || p2.rights < 1) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p," " + p2.username + "'s password is: " + p2.password + "."); } }

could anyone convert that into a client command ? : o

ill be willing to pay .

Read full topic
